using namespace std;
inline void superFastRead (int *a)
{
    char c = 0;
    while(c<33)
    c = fgetc(stdin);
    *a = 0;
    while(c>33)
    {
		*a = *a*10 + c - '0';
		c = fgetc(stdin);
    }
}
 
#define sfr(x) superFastRead(&x)
#define s(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sll(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define sf(x) scanf("%lf",&x)
#define ss(x) scanf("%s",&x)
#define f(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define fr(i,n)  f(i,0,n)
 
typedef long long ll;
 
ll w[100010];
 
int main(){
	ll n, m, add = 0, res = 0;
	sll(n); sll(m);
	w[0] = 5;
	f(i, 1, n) sll(w[i]);
	multiset<ll> S;
	fr(i, m) S.insert(0);
	queue<ll> Q;
	fr(i, m) Q.push(0);
	fr(i, n){
		add += w[i];
		ll y = *S.rbegin() - w[i];
		res += add + y;
		Q.push(y);
		
		ll x = Q.front();
		Q.pop();
		S.erase(S.find(x));
		S.insert(y);
	}
	res += add + *S.rbegin();
	cout<<res<<endl;
	return 0;
}
